name: InnerSpace
description: Soar through virgin skies and dive into lost oceans as you hunt for the ancient gods of the Inverse, a forsaken realm of inside-out planets. Created by a small team of seven developers and originally funded on Kickstarter, InnerSpace is a bright, colorful exploration flying game with no horizons.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or Windows 10 Processor: AMD A8-7600 (3.1 Ghz) OR Intel Core i3 4170 (3.7 Ghz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 650 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 6850 / Intel Iris Pro 5200 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: 1 GB VRAM
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
